name: Mindvalley SEO Force
author: Mindvalley

sections.description:
This shortcode will optionally force SEO metadata to be entered before allowing a post to be published.

Works wonders if you have a dedicated SEO team that works with another team of authors.

It will :-

  1. Notify a list of emails whenever there’s a new post creation.
  2. Display a to-do list to check off before publishing.
  3. Autocompletes the Title and Keywords field with predefined keywords.

Plugin Supports :-

  • All In One SEO Pack

To Do

  1. Support for WordPress SEO by Yoast
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or Download it using the ‘Plugins’ > ‘Add New’ menu
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy!

short_description: Force authors to fullfill SEO requirements before publishing posts.
